scripts.build:wp: cd wasm-build/wordpress-data && bash prepare-wordpress.sh && bash bundle-data.sh
scripts.build:app:node: rm -rf dist-node/* && esbuild --bundle src/node/index.mjs --outfile=dist-node/index.mjs --platform=node --external:express --external:yargs --external:body-parser --external:cookie-parser --external:./src/node/node-php.js --target=node14.19.0 --format=esm && perl -pi.bak -e 's/\.\.\/shared\///g' dist-node/index.mjs && perl -pi.bak -e 's/\.\.\/src\/node\//.\//g' dist-node/index.mjs && cp -r src/node/node-php.* src/node/base64-encoded-database src/node/wordpress src/shared/etc dist-node/ && rm dist-node/*.bak
scripts.publish:php:web: cp wasm-build/php/docker-output/webworker-* dist-web/ && cp src/shared/etc/php.ini dist-web/etc/
scripts.publish:wp:web: cp wasm-build/wordpress-data/docker-output/* dist-web/ && cp wasm-build/wordpress-data/preload/wp-lazy-files.js dist-web/ && rm -rf dist-web/{wp-admin,wp-content,wp-includes} && cp -r wasm-build/wordpress-data/preload/wordpress-static/{wp-admin,wp-content,wp-includes} dist-web/
scripts.publish:wp:node: rm -rf src/node/wordpress/* && cp -r wasm-build/wordpress-data/preload/wordpress-static/{wp-admin,wp-content,wp-includes} src/node/wordpress/ && cp -r wasm-build/wordpress-data/preload/wordpress/* src/node/wordpress/
